#summary authenticate to services
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Client Login for installed application =
== For a Specific Service ==
{{{
service = RGData::DocumentsList::Service.new
client = service.login 'RGData.Library@gmail.com', 'rgdatatest'
}}}

== For More Than One Services ==
{{{
@service = RGData::Service.new
client = service.login 'RGData.Library@gmail.com', 'rgdatatest'
}}}

= Auth Sub =
== For a Specific Service ==
{{{
# use Documents List API
@service = RGData::DocumentsList::Service.new
@service.login_uri('http://yourapp.com/next_path')
}}}

== For More Than One Services ==
{{{
# use Document List API and Blogger API
@service = RGData::Service.new
@service.login_url('http://yourapp.com/next_path', :scope => ['http://docs.google.com/feeds', 'http://www.blogger.com/feeds'])
}}}
